page.title: 08FOOD
page.content: We conducted a survey of 30 people in order to find out about eating habits. Our survey showed no vegetarians. 9 have cooked breakfasts,20 have cereal,7 have no solids. Children interviewed showed that 11 had school dinners,16 have packed lunch,21 have dinner in the evening,4 have tea,16 have pasties regularly. Some popular meals included plaice and prawns,currys,stews,marrow stuffed with lasagne,sweet 'n' sour chicken,prawn sandwiches,health foods. The most well used vegetable is the potato.One husband is responsible for cooking,otherwise the ladies prepared all meals.
